item.title: By: Paul Walsh
item.dc:creator: Paul Walsh
item.description: I don't wish to spam this blog with photos so you can see 'em at http://segala.com/blog/dublin-geek-dinner although they're not great quality (thank God!).
item.content:encoded: I don’t wish to spam this blog with photos so you can see ‘em at http://segala.com/blog/dublin-geek-dinner although they’re not great quality (thank God!).

item.title: By: Paul Walsh
item.dc:creator: Paul Walsh
item.description:
It was fun - especially when I decided to spill an entire bowl of curry on myself!
Conn - shame I only saw your post when it was too late.
Ed, I'll probably do something like this again in a few weeks if there's enough interest!
item.content:encoded:
It was fun – especially when I decided to spill an entire bowl of curry on myself!

Conn – shame I only saw your post when it was too late.

Ed, I’ll probably do something like this again in a few weeks if there’s enough interest!

item.title: By: Ed Byrne
item.dc:creator: Ed Byrne
item.description:
Just seeing this now ... was it good fun ??
Would have liked to attend but am in Poland at the moment (www.hosting365.pl before you ask) ... great opportunities over here for any interested btw. :-)
item.content:encoded:
Just seeing this now … was it good fun ??

Would have liked to attend but am in Poland at the moment (www.hosting365.pl before you ask) … great opportunities over here for any interested btw.

item.title: By: Conn O Muineachain
item.dc:creator: Conn O Muineachain
item.description: Like John, I'll be at the Digital Media Awards as well. In fact there'll be quite a few bloggers there. Unfortunately, it's hard to say what time it will be finished. (Dinner's at 8:00) If we don't make it to you, maybe you might like to look in on us later? It's in the Burlington. (Slightly different dress code though!)
item.content:encoded: Like John, I’ll be at the Digital Media Awards as well. In fact there’ll be quite a few bloggers there. Unfortunately, it’s hard to say what time it will be finished. (Dinner’s at 8:00) If we don’t make it to you, maybe you might like to look in on us later? It’s in the Burlington. (Slightly different dress code though!)

item.title: By: Paul Walsh
item.dc:creator: Paul Walsh
item.description: Look forward to seeing you Mark. Keep an eye on http://segala.com/blog/fancy-a-curry-20 for updates.
item.content:encoded: Look forward to seeing you Mark. Keep an eye on http://segala.com/blog/fancy-a-curry-20 for updates.

item.title: By: Mark
item.dc:creator: Mark
item.description: Two more would like to drop-in this evening - we rather fancy some Indian food, but must head off to Cold War Kids in Tripod at about 8/8.30ish. Myself, and my mate Ian from WebKitchen.ie
item.content:encoded: Two more would like to drop-in this evening – we rather fancy some Indian food, but must head off to Cold War Kids in Tripod at about 8/8.30ish. Myself, and my mate Ian from WebKitchen.ie

item.title: By: Paul Walsh
item.dc:creator: Paul Walsh
item.description:
Sure thing John. What time?
Elly, is your fella coming? If so, what time do you two expect to arrive roughly?
item.content:encoded:

item.title: By: John Breslin
item.dc:creator: John Breslin
item.description: Dang - I'll be in Dublin tomorrow for the Digital Media awards - so could nearly meet up - if there's time afterwards :D
item.content:encoded: Dang – I’ll be in Dublin tomorrow for the Digital Media awards – so could nearly meet up – if there’s time afterwards

item.title: By: elly parker
item.dc:creator: elly parker
item.description: I'll be there, but by myself as 'Him Indoors' will be driving back from work in Carlow, and he doesn't normally get home until 7:30...
item.content:encoded: I’ll be there, but by myself as ‘Him Indoors’ will be driving back from work in Carlow, and he doesn’t normally get home until 7:30…
